description: Basic on-chip machine learning framework for System-on-Chip (SoC) FPGAs using Direct Memory Access.
Comparative fake news detection framework using TF-IDF + classical machine learning models and BERT fine-tuning, achieving up to 99.26% accuracy.
A computer vision and machine learning pipeline on a distributed framework. Designed for an embedded network on low voltage IoT hardware.

A curated list of awesome frameworks, libraries, tools, and resources for Artificial Intelligence (AI). This list covers everything from foundational machine learning and deep learning to specialized areas like NLP, computer vision, and AI ethics.

Heart disease classification project using a dataset of 920 patient records. Evaluates ML and deep learning models including Logistic Regression, SVM, Random Forest, XGBoost, LightGBM, CatBoost, and TabNet. CatBoost achieved the best results, with SHAP analysis used to interpret key clinical features.
Machinelearning driven short-selling and portfolio backtesting framework for OMXS30, with an interactive Dash dashboard.
Repo for MORE-Q(X) dataset and MORE-ML machine learning framework

Companion repository for the paper Threat-Driven Frameworks for Privacy-Preserving Machine Learning: A Practitioners Guide (20172025). Contains benchmarking tables, framework metrics, figure sources, and reference summaries for privacy-preserving ML techniques.

A physics-informed, data-driven framework integrating Silvaco ATLAS TCAD simulations with advanced machine learning models for fast and accurate prediction of Double-Gate Tunnel FET (DG-TFET) electrical characteristics.
High-Performance, Scalable, and Adaptive ForgeDraft Framework enables Intelligent, Event-Driven Architectures with Distributed Machine Learning Integration.

EcoGuard is an intelligent IoT-enabled AI framework designed for real-time detection and prevention of environmental crimes. It leverages sensor networks, machine learning, and automated alerts to monitor ecosystems, identify illegal activities, and support sustainable environmental protection.

Auditron is an open-source Python evaluation and testing framework for AI and machine-learning systems. It supports traditional ML workflows and modern AI systems, including LLMs and document-based pipelines, to automatically detect risks and quality issues before deployment, enabling safer, fairer, and more reliable AI models.

This project aims to predict student academic outcomes (Pass/Fail) by analyzing a combination of demographic, behavioral, and academic features. By leveraging multiple machine learning algorithms, the project identifies key factors that contribute to student success and provides a robust prediction framework.

An AI-driven unified framework is proposed for early prediction of major non-communicable diseases using clinical and medical imaging data. It combines advanced machine learning for structured data and deep learning for images, with explainable AI to ensure accurate, scalable, and interpretable clinical decision support.
Empower machines to reason about affordances in new environments with A4-Agent's advanced zero-shot learning framework.
A framework for developing multi-scale arrays for use in scientific machine learning (SciML) simulations

A fast, distributed, high performance gradient boosting (GBT, GBDT, GBRT, GBM or MART) framework based on decision tree algorithms, used for ranking, classification and many other machine learning tasks.
A unified framework for machine learning with time series
Machine learning framework for modeling glacier surface mass balance (SMB) and surface energy balance (SEB) using COSIPY output and ERA5-Land..

Petastorm library enables single machine or distributed training and evaluation of deep learning models from datasets in Apache Parquet format. It supports ML frameworks such as Tensorflow, Pytorch, and PySpark and can be used from pure Python code.

RESTful API for vector similarity search. It uses the Python web framework FastAPI and a REDIS vector database.  This accelerates machine learning workflows that require vector similarity search using classification models.
A Python Framework for Multi-Agent Programming with Machine Learning
Framework for machine learning with spiking neural networks

A custom machine learning framework built from scratch in C while learning core AI and ML concepts. Implements data processing, encoding, mathematical operations, and model logic without third-party or prebuilt ML libraries. Focused on low-level understanding, memory management, performance optimization, and scalable ML systems.
This project investigates the short-term directional behavior of Bitcoin by integrating macroeconomic indicators  and applying a machine learningbased classification framework.
Evidence-Driven Differential Diagnosis: A Machine-Learning Framework Integrating Structured Patient Data and Metadata-Derived Human-Readable Clinical Evidence
The PennyLane-Qrack plugin integrates the Qrack quantum computing framework with PennyLane's quantum machine learning capabilities.
A flexible and performant framework for training machine learning potentials.

An AI-driven adaptive honeypot framework that dynamically deceives attackers, analyzes behavior using machine learning and reinforcement learning, and generates actionable threat intelligence mapped to the MITRE ATT&CK framework.
This study presents a machine learningbased framework for classifying pore-scale flow geometries as simple or complex using simulation-derived geometric and velocity features.
Aplikasi mobile framework flutter dengan menggunakan machine learning  metode unsupervised learning k-means
A quantitative data-science framework to understand and predict cross-market risk contagion across global financial markets using causal inference and machine learning techniques.
A machine learning framework using active learning strategies to accelerate the design of BCC solid solution high-entropy alloys

I'm a Results-driven Software Engineer with expertise in computer vision and machine learning applications. My journey in tech has been fueled by a passion for creating intelligent systems that solve real-world problems.  With a strong background in Python programming, deep learning frameworks, and image processing technologies.

P2P lending platforms require effective credit risk assessment to balance default risk against expected returns. Using ~410,000 historical loans from Bondora (2009-2024), this analysis develops a machine learning framework to predict loan defaults and optimize portfolio capital allocation strategies for investors operating under limited capital.

This project develops an optimized multimodel fusion approach to improve the accuracy of lung cancer recurrence prediction using machine learning and deep learning techniques. By combining multiple models, the system provides a more reliable and robust framework for early recurrence detection.

The project deals with identifying the students, who is drop-out from their academic course without completing it and those who will continue their study, based on academic, demographic and financial dataset. The project used three traditional(decision tree, naive bayes and random forest) and three modern (CatBoost, XGBoost and LightGBM) algorithms

This study proposes a machine learning approach to predict mechanical and biological performance of 3D bioprinted scaffolds using printing parameters and bio-ink features, enabling improved scaffold design and optimization.

A comprehensive journey through the mathematical foundations of Machine Learning. This repository contains implementations of core ML algorithms built entirely from scratch, focusing on the underlying linear algebra, calculus, and optimization theory. No high-level frameworks are used for the core logicjust pure mathematics translated into code.
A machine learningdriven framework to analyze and classify internal migration patterns in India using Aadhaar address update data.

brpc is an Industrial-grade RPC framework using C++ Language, which is often used in high performance system such as Search, Storage, Machine learning, Advertisement, Recommendation etc. "brpc" means "better RPC".

This project develops a robust regression framework for Porter, Indias logistics leader, to predict food delivery times. By transforming raw delivery logs into a structured dataset, I built a high-accuracy Artificial Neural Network (ANN) that accounts for restaurant preparation times, partner availability, and traffic patterns.
Comprehensive Tunneling Performance Analytics - ML framework for MTBM optimization with 90%+ accuracy, 50+ SQL queries, Power BI dashboards |          Python, scikit-learn, SQL"

clinical machine learning framework designed to predict patient-specific response to riluzole therapy in Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS) using longitudinal respiratory and motor function data from the PRO-ACT dataset.
MLForge is a production-grade Machine Learning & MLOps framework for building, training, testing, deploying, and monitoring ML systems end-to-end.
Machine-learning framework for predicting phenotypic traits in Metschnikowia pulcherrima

An explainable multi-level framework for cervical cancer detection integrating traditional computer vision, machine learning, and deep learning models, evaluated across three benchmark cytology datasets with comprehensive XAI-based interpretability.
This repository includes all the code developed during my in-depth exploration of machine learning and deep learning frameworks.
A flexible machine & deep learning framework built from scratch using only NumPy
Transformers: the model-definition framework for state-of-the-art machine learning models in text, vision, audio, and multimodal models, for both inference and training.

In finance, risk management has overseen a wide variety of implementations involving machine learning. In recent times, deep learning has become especially prominent in this branch. I investigate a recent paper published in 2025 proposing a hybrid LSTM-CNN framework for risk management, performing lit. review, replication, and extensions.
Discover key research papers on Quantum Machine Learning (QML) and explore transfer learning frameworks, applications, and optimization strategies.

This repository contains the group project for the Machine Learning for Networking (ML4N) course. The project focuses on analyzing 230,000+ unique Unix shell attacks captured in a honeypot environment. By leveraging NLP techniques (TF-IDF, BoW) and ML, we aim to automatically identify attacker intents based on the MITRE ATT&CK framework.
OpenCircuitDesigner (a work in progress) is a simple Python framework for prototyping  EDA (Electronic Design Automation) + ML (Machine Learning) workflows specific to OLED pixel circuit design.

An end-to-end machine learning research and experimentation framework for Forex market prediction, signal generation (BUY / SELL / HOLD), and performance evaluation using feature engineering, ensemble learning, and time-series modeling.
A machine learning and Monte Carlo framework for scenario-based geopolitical analysis
It's a replication of a paper named Identifying Firm Environmental Violation Risk: A Machine Learning Approach Based on the GONE Framework
Automatic Machine Learning framework with end-to-end Training and Inference support.
Code for training and validation

Alert Prioritization System using Learning-to-Rank (RankNet, LambdaRank, LambdaMART) A machine learningbased alert ranking framework that prioritizes network intrusion alerts using CIC-IDS 2017 data and LightGBM learning-to-rank algorithms, simulating real-world SOC alert triage.
Developing an automated credit risk management framework, integrating high-performance machine learning and an algorithmic bias control mechanism.
Impact-induced failure mode prediction of RC beams and columns using a machine learning framework with improved data-algorithm strategies

A real-time handwritten number detection application built using Python and Machine Learning, featuring digit classification with bounding box visualization using Pygame. Frameworks and libraries used - Python, TensorFlow/Keras, NumPy, OpenCV, Pygame

This Python package  provides a robust framework to automatically train, evaluate, and visualize multiple machine learning models for both Classification and Regression problems.  It includes features for automatic best model recommendation, colorful confusion matrices, and comprehensive performance plots.
Distributed tensors and Machine Learning framework with GPU and MPI acceleration in Python

CircumSpectrum is a flux-based framework that converts bulk and single-cell RNA-seq data into metabolic fingerprints using genome-scale models and machine learning. It includes RADAR, SOURIS, and CORALIE modules for reaction-level, cross-cohort, and multi-tier correlation analyses.

A machine learning framework for cloud resource forecasting using time-series algorithms (Random Forest, SVM, Informer, SCINet). Includes interactive Streamlit dashboard for visualizing CPU/memory predictions on real workload traces (Alibaba 2018, Google 2019). Optimize capacity planning and reduce cloud costs.

The Extreme Gradient Boosting (XGB) model exhibited the best predictive performance on the testing set.  In this work, we proposed a machine learning framework to predict the f values of ABO4-type ceramics.
The PennyLane-Qulacs plugin integrates the Qulacs quantum computing framework with PennyLane's quantum machine learning capabilities.
Multi-Criteria Decision Making (MCDM) Framework for Building Energy Systems with Expedited Computation using Machine Learning (ML) Techniques
A versatile local LLM framework for chat, image, video, machine learning modelling, speech, and automation

A Java-based LLM Agent framework using an explicit state machine with planning-first, tool-driven execution, structured observations, and robust error handling. Designed for controllability, observability, and production-ready Agent experiments.
A Framework for Developing Robust Machine Learning Models in Harsh Environments

This project is a Smart Home Energy Saving application designed to optimize energy consumption in smart homes. It is built using a combination of machine learning models and generative AI, leveraging a multi-agent framework (Microsoft Agent Framework).
Statistical and machine learning framework for assessing inter-rater reliability, meta-analytic validation proportions, and predictors of perfect validation scores using R.
Forecasting S&P 500 realized volatility using econometric and machine-learning models under a strict walk-forward framework, highlighting the role of nonlinear interactions and regime dependence.

This repository contains a collection of Python programs and Jupyter notebooks focusing on Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) algorithms. It covers implementations, experiments, and hands-on code examples using popular libraries and frameworks in Python.

This project is a Machine Learning web application built using Streamlit that predicts the species of an Iris flower based on user-provided measurements.  The application demonstrates how a trained ML model can be quickly deployed as an interactive web app using pure Python, without any frontend frameworks.
A generalized hybrid machine learning and optimization framework for market return prediction under risk constraints.
Implementation of a framework that combines comparative metrics and machine learning to evaluate OSM 3D building data quality.
An open-source Python framework for hybrid quantum-classical machine learning.

This study presents a machine learningbased comparative framework for classifying countries into high- and low-population-density categories using real-world demographic indicators collected through web scraping

STAR-XPLAIN is an Explainable AI framework for interpretable analysis of astronomical light curves, combining classical machine learning, deep learning, and XAI methods to connect model predictions with physical astrophysical features.
A communication framework between client applications and machine learning models
Clustering Exercice from "Machine Learning" subject in "Mster en Cincia de Dades" from Universitat de Girona (UdG). Teacher Marc Comas.

Atlas DataFlow  um framework contrato-driven para construo de pipelines analticos modulares, auditveis e adaptveis. Organiza o fluxo de dados em etapas orientadas a domnio, promovendo rastreabilidade, reprodutibilidade e integrao consistente entre anlise de dados, modelagem estatstica e aplicaes de machine learning.
PyTorch Playground (open source machine learning framework)

This repository provides a comprehensive framework for enhancing nuclear Density Functional Theory (DRHBc) predictions through physics-informed machine learning. Our approach combines -learning with domain-specific feature engineering to significantly improve the accuracy of nuclear binding energies, charge radii, and separation energy predictions

A platform developed from an open framework to help AI researchers and developers to rapidly prototype, test and deploy workflows that include machine learning models as worker components. The workflow can be invoked on command line or web service, as well as integrated into UX/UI as part of a larger intelligent solution.
DistroML is an enterprise-grade distributed machine learning training framework designed to accelerate deep learning workflows across multiple GPUs, nodes, and cloud environments.
caretSDM applies a geoprocessing framework to the caret machine learning package, facilitating the access of Species Distribution Modeling community to state-of-the-art methods.

Machine learning fundamentals implemented from scratch to study optimization, generalization, and model behavior. Built with NumPy to deeply understand gradient descent, backpropagation, and failure modes beyond black-box frameworks.
A Spring-based AI/ML framework for building intelligent applications,  providing a solid foundation for machine learning, NLP, CV, and more.
An intelligent data collection and preprocessing framework for predicting house prices using machine learning techniques.
This project develops and critically evaluates a machine learning framework for improved prediction of human thermal sensation
